item.title: <% tp.file.title %>
item.description: <%* try { await tp.file.rename(“index”); } catch (error) { console.error(“Error renaming file:”, error); // Optionally, you can add a message here to notify the user console.log(“File rename failed. Please check the console for details.”); } %>
